did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Eugene V. Debs Letter to Sidney Rissman, 1925
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor- Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Photocopy of 1925 letter from Eugene V. Debs to Sidney Rissman, forwarded from Jack Sheinkman to Richard Strassberg in 1986.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a photocopy of 1925 letter from Eugene V. Debs to Sidney Rissman, with a transmittal slip from Jack Sheinkman to Richard Strassberg in 1986.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Eugene V. Debs Letter to Sidney Rissman #5763m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
